title: Higher loop corrections in noncommutative supersymmetric QED
abstract: The superfield formulation of the theory is systematically used to demonstrate the absence of quadratic divergences in the effective action up to two-loop order. The one-loop corrections to the gauge superfield three-point function is studied in detail in the covariant as well as in the Wess-Zumino gauge. We make some observations concerning the one-loop corrections of higher-point functions of the gauge superfield.
